channel.title: Pages on Presentation Lane

item.title: Twitter Bio Rewrite
item.description:
Min Rewrite (Absolute Minimum Rewrite)

MobileMuster is the official product stewardship program of the mobile phone industry. It recycles for free all handsets, batteries, charges and accessories.
We recycle your mobile phones for free! Your batteries and chargers too! MobileMuster is the official product stewardship program of the mobile phone industry.


*This Min Rewrite… 1) Fixes a typo. 2) States your value proposition first and foremost; before your long, official title.

Medium Rewrite (Absolute Minimum Rewrite)

MobileMuster is the official product stewardship program of the mobile phone industry. It recycles for free all handsets, batteries, charges and accessories.
We recycle your mobile phones for free! Your batteries and chargers too! Get a free reply paid satchel from @auspost today. #SaveOurPlanet


*This Medium Rewrite… 1) Fixes a typo. 2) States your value proposition first and foremost. 3) Replaces your long, official title with a *clickable call to action (clicks to Australia Post on Twitter).

Max Rewrite (Absolute Minimum Rewrite)

MobileMuster is the official product stewardship program of the mobile phone industry. It recycles for free all handsets, batteries, charges and accessories.
We recycle your mobile phones for free! Your batteries and chargers too! Get a free reply paid satchel from @auspost today. #SaveOurPlanet


*This Max Rewrite… 1) Fixes a typo. 2) States your value proposition first and foremost. 3) Replaces your long, official title with a *clickable call to action (clicks to Australia Post on Twitter).
